Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-2312 affecting package cifs-utils for versions less than 6.14-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-2312 affecting package cifs-utils for versions less than 6.14-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cifs-utils is earlier than 6.14-3, affected by CVE-2025-2312
